summary: A test suite that verifies the core behavior of a parametrized block operation, checking that parameters are correctly assigned, durations are retrieved only when set, channels compare equal when expected, context handling works, instructions can be replaced, and parameter assignment reporting functions as intended.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correct implementation of parametrized block operations to prevent bugs related to parameter handling, duration calculation, channel equality, context management, and instruction replacement in the application.
